```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library("flexdashboard")
library("plotly")
library("readr")
library("httr")
library("tidyr")
library("dplyr")
library("lubridate")
library("ggplot2")
library("purrr")
library("RColorBrewer")
source("Extract_Data.R")

No_of_Countrys <- 6


```


Australian Overview
===================================== 

Row {data-height=150}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Confirmed

```{r}
valueBox(sum(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co$Count), 
         icon = "fa-frown-o",
         color = "primary")

```


### Recovered

```{r}
valueBox(sum(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Re$Count), 
         icon = "fa-medkit",
         color = "success")

```

### Deaths

```{r}
valueBox(sum(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_De$Count), 
         icon = "fa-times-circle",
         color = "danger")
```

### Last Updated

```{r}
valueBox(format(max(Data_Australia$Dates), "%b %d"), 
         icon = "fa-clock",
         color = "primary")
```


Row {data-height=350 .tabset .tabset-fade}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Total Number of Confirmed Cases 

```{r}

Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co <- Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co %>%
      arrange(desc(Count)) %>%
      head(No_of_Countrys)

Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co <- Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co %>%
      filter(Location %in% unique(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co$Location))

ggplotly(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = Location, y = Count, fill = Location)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
    scale_fill_hue() +
    theme_minimal() +
    labs(title = "", x = "", y = "") +
    theme(legend.position = "none") +
    geom_text(label = Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co$Count, nudge_y = 20) +
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, max(Data_Australia_Co$Count) + (0.10 * max(Data_Australia_Co$Count)))) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = brewer.pal(9, "Blues")[3:9]))
  

```

Row {data-height=550}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Confirmed Cases Overtime {.no-mobile}

```{r}

Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co <- Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co %>%
      arrange(desc(Count)) %>%
      head(No_of_Countrys)

Data_Australia_Co <- Data_Australia_Co %>%
      filter(Location %in% unique(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co$Location))

ggplotly(Data_Australia_Co %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Dates, fill = Location, weight = Count)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  scale_fill_hue() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "", x = "", y = "") +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  facet_wrap(vars(Location)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = brewer.pal(9, "Blues")[3:9]))


```


### Confirmed Cases Overtime {.mobile}

```{r}

Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co <- Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co %>%
      arrange(desc(Count)) %>%
      head(No_of_Countrys)

Data_Australia_Co <- Data_Australia_Co %>%
      filter(Location %in% unique(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co$Location))

ggplotly(Data_Australia_Co %>%
            ggplot(aes(x = Dates, fill = Location, weight = Count)) +
            geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
            scale_fill_hue() +
            theme_minimal() +
            labs(title = "", x = "", y = "") +
            theme(legend.position = "none") +
            facet_wrap(vars(Location)) +
            scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 months", date_labels = "%b") +
            scale_fill_manual(values = brewer.pal(9, "Blues")[3:9]))


```
